mainBoard.flavorText: As larvae, they burrow into a host's brain to feed upon it, growing until they're large enough to burst free and seek out larger prey.

mainBoard.name: Deathbringer Regent
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

rulings.text: Deathbringer Regent's last ability destroys all creatures except Deathbringer Regent, including the five other creatures required for the ability to have an effect.

If you cast a creature spell that enters the battlefield as a copy of Deathbringer Regent, the enters-the-battlefield ability will trigger (assuming the “five or more other creatures” requirement is also met).

mainBoard.name: Plaguecrafter
mainBoard.originalText: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

rulings.text: As Plaguecrafter's ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then each other player in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen permanents are sacrificed at the same time. Next, each player in the same order who couldn't sacrifice a permanent chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then the chosen cards are discarded at the same time.
Each player chooses a permanent to sacrifice from among the creatures and planeswalkers they control. You don't choose which type of permanent any other player has to sacrifice.
Plaguecrafter can be the creature its controller sacrifices for its own ability.

{1}{B}{B}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Idole infernale : Vous piochez deux cartes et vous perdez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La morte della corriera è stata un disgraziato incidente; d'altro canto, era stata avvertita di non toccarlo."
—Lord Xander
foreignData.name: Idolo Infernale
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {B}.
{1}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Idolo Infernale: Peschi due carte e perdi 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText:
「急使の死は誠に残念だ。しかし、彼女には触らないよう警告していたのだが。」
――ザンダー卿
foreignData.name: 冥府の偶像
foreignData.text:
{T}：{B}を加える。
{1}{B}{B},{T},冥府の偶像を生け贄に捧げる：あなたはカード２枚を引き、２点のライフを失う。

foreignData.flavorText:
「讯使不幸身故，在下深表惋悼。然她明已受诫不应触碰雕像却执意为之，亦属不妥。」
～尚夺尔勋爵
foreignData.name: 炼狱雕像
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{B}。
{1}{B}{B}，{T}，牺牲炼狱雕像：你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

mainBoard.name: Infernal Idol
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Infernal Idol: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Infernal Idol: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"If you hear a groaning noise in the cellar, don't investigate. Don't split up. Just lock the door and barricade it."
—Emili, guard captain

foreignData.flavorText:
„Falls ihr ein Stöhnen aus dem Keller hört, ignoriert es. Teilt euch nicht auf. Versperrt einfach die Tür und verbarrikadiert sie."
—Emili, Hauptmann der Wache
foreignData.name: Lebendig gefressen
foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur oder bezahle {3}{B} als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Si oyen una especie de gruñido en el sótano, no lo investiguen ni se separen. Simplemente, cierren la puerta y bloquéenla".
—Emili, capitana de la guardia
foreignData.name: Devorado vivo
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura o paga {3}{B}.
Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Si vous entendez un grognement dans la cave, n'allez pas jeter un œil. Ne vous séparez pas. Verrouillez la porte et barricadez-la. »
—Emili, capitaine de la garde
foreignData.name: Dévoré vivant
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature ou payez {3}{B}.
Exilez une cible, créature ou planeswalker.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Se sentite un gemito provenire dalla cantina, non indagate. Non vi separate. Bloccate la porta e barricatevi."
—Emilia, capitana della guardia
foreignData.name: Mangiato Vivo
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura o paga {3}{B}.
Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「地下室からうめき声が聞こえても、確かめに行ってはだめ。別行動は厳禁。とにかく鍵を閉めて、扉を塞ぐのよ。」
――護衛隊長、エミリ
foreignData.name: 踊り食い
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるか{3}{B}を支払う。
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を対象とする。それを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText:
「如果你听见地窖传出呻吟声，不要好奇妄动。不要分头行事。只管闩紧门口，全力顶住。」
～守卫队长艾蜜莉
foreignData.name: 生吞活剥
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物或支付{3}{B}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。

mainBoard.name: Eaten Alive
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

foreignData.flavorText: Schönheit zeigt sich denen, die sie erkennen können, an merkwürdigen Orten.
foreignData.name: Gedeihendes Moor
foreignData.text:
Das Gedeihende Moor kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie das Gedeihende Moor ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Schwarz.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Los que ven la belleza son capaces de vislumbrarla en lugares extraños.
foreignData.name: Páramo floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Páramo floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Páramo floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea negro.
{T}: Agrega {B} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: La beauté perle dans des endroits étranges pour ceux qui peuvent la voir.
foreignData.name: Lande prospère
foreignData.text:
La Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le noir.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: La bellezza si manifesta in luoghi insoliti per chi ha occhi per vederla.
foreignData.name: Landa Florida
foreignData.text:
La Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal nero.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 奇妙な場所にも美は存在し、見る目を持つものを楽しませる。
foreignData.name: 興隆する湿地帯
foreignData.text:
興隆する湿地帯はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する湿地帯が戦場に出るに際し、黒でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{B}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 此地美景尽藏奇异之处，唯眼光独到者方能得见。
foreignData.name: 兴旺湿地
foreignData.text:
兴旺湿地须横置进战场。
于兴旺湿地进战场时，选择一种黑色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{B}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Moor enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
